If you would like to know how to get a head of your competition this book is for you.Contents include: How to Use This Guide, First Things First Understanding the Fire Service, All About Hiring, The Assessment Process And Application, The Written Test, The Physical Ability Test, Cardio Conditioning, Strength Training, PAT Specific Conditioning, Oral Interview, Background Investigation and Psychological Exam, Medical History And Exam, Final Thoughts, Addendum, Firefighter Entrance Exam Preparation Documents, Planning Bundle Worksheets, Strength Training Split Program Chart, Timed-physical Ability Test Training Techniques and Test Day Tips and Trick, Candidate Physical Ability Test Training Techniques and Tips, References

Most fire departments have hiring practices that are complex, with multi-part processes and requirements. If you aspire to become a professional firefighter, you must first understand them and learn how to use them to your advantage. Knowing what to expect will help you acquire the self-assurance to execute a plan and prepare yourself accordingly.

For your convenience, this guide includes “Data Collection” worksheets for you to complete and an exam preparation planner. Make copies or work directly from the guide. For other helpful training tips and tools, go to TheFirehousePress.com.
The Data Collection Worksheet will prompt you to ask pertinent questions relevant to the assessment process. The intelligence you gather will help you develop an informed strategic plan.
The Exam Prep Planner is a bundle of planning documents that will help you define your goals, schedule objectives, log tasks and track your progress.
description: "Mastering the Firefighter Exam is the complete package if you're looking to burst onto the scene without any prior knowledge of the Fire Service. This text is a thorough overview that reveals the 'ins' and 'outs' of becoming a career firefighter. Covering every topic from "How to Apply," to the "Interview Process," and even "Physical Fitness," no stone is left unturned in this expertly written guide for anyone that wants to become a firefighter."

"This book is an excellent comprehensive guide of how to land your dream job. I'm confident that I would have gotten hired sooner if this book had been one of my resources. A must read for anyone looking to become a career firefighter."

"What a fantastic resource for someone looking to really understand what it takes to become a firefighter! This book lays out step by step what a person will have to prepare for - both mentally and physically. I highly recommend this book to anyone looking to test for the fire service."

"This book is a well written, easy to understand guide, on how to prepare for and successfully complete all phases of the firefighter hiring process. This book will help deepen your knowledge of what it takes to become a firefighter and help demystify the hiring process. I highly recommend this book for anyone seeking a career in the fire service."
